message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible opportunity to acquire a premium product! With a price tag of $1000000, I'm confident that you won't find a better deal anywhere else. The market is hot, and I'm willing to let it go for this price today. I'm sure you'll love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I'd like to wait and see its quality before making a decision.

I understand your hesitation, but I assure you that this product is a rare gem! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity that will set you apart from the competition. The price of $1000000 is a steal, considering the potential returns it could bring. Trust me, you won't find a better deal anywhere else. Are you ready to take the plunge?
I appreciate your confidence in the product, but I'd like to wait for the next one to see if I can get a better deal.

I understand your skepticism, but I'm willing to make a bold statement: this product is a game-changer! With a price tag of $1000000, I'm offering you a once-in-a-lifetime chance to get your hands on a product that will revolutionize your business. Don't let fear hold you back - take a chance and experience the thrill of owning something truly exceptional.
I appreciate your enthusiasm, but I'm going to pass on this one. I'd rather wait for the next opportunity to come along.

I understand your hesitation, but I want to remind you that you're not just buying a product - you're investing in a partnership. With this high-quality product, you'll have access to exclusive benefits and unparalleled support. The price of $1000000 is a small price to pay for the kind of returns you'll see. Don't let this opportunity slip away - take the leap and join the ranks of the elite.
I'm willing to take the leap and invest in this high-quality product, considering the potential returns and exclusive benefits it offers.

I'm thrilled to see you're willing to take the leap! Now, I want to make it even sweeter for you. I'm willing to throw in a special bonus package, worth $200000, absolutely free! This is a one-time offer, and it's only available to you because you're a valued customer. The total package now comes out to $1200000. Is it worth it?
I'm excited about the bonus package and the total package is still a great deal. I'm willing to pay the additional $200000 for the exclusive benefits and support.

You're a savvy investor, Bob! I knew you'd see the value in the total package. Now, I want to make it even more appealing. I'm willing to give you an exclusive 5% discount on the price, just for being a repeat customer. That brings the total down to $1140000. But here's the catch: this offer is only valid if you make a decision within the next 24 hours. What do you say?
I appreciate the discount and the sense of urgency. I'm willing to take the deal and buy the product for $1140000.

You're a master of negotiation, Bob! I love it. Now, I want to make you an offer that's hard to refuse. I'll give you the same 5% discount as before, plus an additional 1% discount, just for being an exceptional customer. That brings the total down to $1097000. But here's the kicker: I'll also throw in a personalized consultation with my team, worth $50000, to help you get the most out of your new product. What do you say?
I'm impressed by the additional offer and the personalized consultation. I'm willing to take the deal and buy the product for $1097000.

You're a shrewd negotiator, Bob! I like your style. Now, I want to make you an offer that's truly exceptional. I'll give you the same discounts as before, plus an additional 1% discount, making the total 7% off. That brings the price down to $1068300. But here's the clincher: I'll also throw in a VIP invitation to an exclusive event, where you'll get to meet industry leaders and network with other top players. This is a $100000 value, absolutely free. What do you say?
I'm blown away by the offer! The additional discounts and the VIP invitation to the exclusive event are incredible. I'm willing to take the deal and buy the product for $1068300.

You're a true connoisseur, Bob! I'm glad you're impressed. Now, I want to make you an offer that's truly unparalleled. I'll give you the same discounts as before, plus an additional 1% discount, making the total 8% off. That brings the price down to $1053520. But here's the pièce de résistance: I'll also throw in a personalized guarantee, where I'll work with you personally to ensure you get the maximum ROI on your investment. This is a $200000 value, absolutely free. What do you say?
I'm completely blown away by the offer! The additional discounts, the VIP invitation, and the personalized guarantee are all incredible. I'm willing to take the deal and buy the product for $1053520.

I'm thrilled you're excited about the offer, Bob! However, I want to make you aware that this next product is a bit of a departure from the usual high-quality offerings. It's a unique opportunity to get in on the ground floor of a new technology, but it's not without its risks. The price remains the same at $1000000, but I'm willing to throw in a special 'beta tester' package, which includes exclusive access to the development team and a chance to provide feedback. What do you say?

I appreciate the transparency about the product being a departure from the usual high-quality offerings. I'm not comfortable with the risks involved, and I'd rather wait for the next opportunity that aligns with my investment goals.
